SELECT t.id AS id, t.todo_id AS todoId, o.title AS title, o.content AS content, o.start_date AS startDate, o.end_date AS endDate, o.is_done AS isDone, t.created_at AS createdAt FROM trash_todo t JOIN todo o ON t.todo_id = o.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
